text:
Hello
It is possible to a create custom search functionality modulethe keyword will be searched and  managed using HubDB? and also want a way to take the search tool managed through HubSpot and embed it on other, non-HubSpot sites (perhaps by iframe or other method TBD
please help me this is possible in HubSpot?
shall we call the same HubSpot search functionality (like iframe in any other method) to the not HubSpot site ?

Hey guys :wave:!

is it possible to edit the URL structure of hubdb dynamic pages?
default structure is `domain`/`lang` /`request.path`/`row.hs_path`
is it possible to insert a directory from a column in the hubdb?
Something like:`domain`/`lang` /`request.path`/`row.mycolumn.name`/`row.hs_path`

Hello to all. I have a very practical question. Where would you define all the ids of the tables (hubdb) for the testing and production environments.

My idea was to create a partial template for this.

This option works for me for a standard partial.

But it did not work when I tried a global partial instead (= why could it be?)

Also, I had thought of adding it to the field.json of the "theme"... but hubdb fields are not allowed in this file...
